extendedInfo.description: Tired of scrolling for contact to call or using search option and keyboard to find contact?This simple dialer helps. Just choose starting letter, then choose contact. Settings can help you personalize your "calling way".

reviews.comment: Cool Android OS app. Simple but VERY useful. A real time and effort saver.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app except for the fact that I use symbols on my phone book to find people faster and this won\'t use that. The stock dialer does. Go figure...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Come on fix the defective repeating of contacts\' phone #\'s already. -can\'t just milk us off with the ads for ever,you know.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I never take the time to comment on my apps.. but this one makes finding a contact of 160+ #s much MUCH faster. Highly recommend for a free app..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Better if i could press 2 letters. I have 30 starting with h so still have to scroll :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t get the point of this app. Default app on incredible let\'s you hit a few letters and the contact pops right up. This is one letter and a scroll.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best of its type I can find. Could you give an option to filter where the contacts are taken from e.g. phone or sim but not both?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app makes finding a contact a breeze. Absolutely LOVE IT! Great job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very nice app. Dev pls give a option to put it as a widget. Its of no use if we have to browse for the shortcut. Otherwise 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app!Makesit so you dont haveto scroll through all your contacts(ihaveover700)that suckedneeds a button for cotacts that start with numbers
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great concept if it added a link to messaging it would be one of the best. Ads slow it down causing misdials. Droid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t understand all the positive comments. When I open a contact I\'m given the contacts phone number five times;annoying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good on organizing contacts BUT keeps some phone numbers from my Facebook even when they\'re not in my phonebook nor my friend! FIX plzzz!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Hey this is great... o wait, lets try to make it better by adding ads because that makes a lot of sense. I mean it made it work faster for me right!?!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! Makes finding contacts sooo easy and allows you to see all available numbers simultaneously! LOVE IT! New updates just keep coming
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Concept
reviews.comment: This app is a great concept, I just wish it would develop more with theming options and maybe sharing options from the contacts to facebook or something. It has limitless potential. The genius of it is already there (selecting the contact by letter) it just needs some bells and whistles.....at least some different themes for it, developer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just installed it and so far I really like it, much faster finding contacts.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best free app! Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its fast. It does what it says. I also like the way you can customize the colors & other functions to suit you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So much easier than scrolling thru all contacts but doesn\'t just dial default #, have 2 pick which # 2 call. Moto droid
reviews.author: A Google User
